query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `campaign_templates` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `category` enum('onboarding', 'check_in', 'nurturing', 'engagement', 'follow_up', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  `campaign_type` enum('candidate_nurturing', 'interview_reminder', 'follow_up', 'onboarding', 'engagement', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  `schedule_type` enum('immediate', 'scheduled', 'recurring', 'trigger_based') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'scheduled',
  `email_sequence` json,
  `default_recurring_pattern` json,
  `default_trigger_event` enum('application_received', 'interview_scheduled', 'interview_completed', 'days_after_application', 'days_before_interview', 'custom'),
  `default_trigger_delay` int,
  `is_built_in` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `is_active` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `usage_count` int DEFAULT 0,
  `tags` json,
  `created_by` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  `email_sequence` json,

  `is_active` boolean DEFAULT true,

  `created_by` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
